text: phir jab apne aur us ke dushman ko pakadna chaaha, wo faryaadi kehne laga, Mosa(alaihissalaam) kya jis tarah tu ne kal ek shaqs ko qatal kiya hai, mujhe bhi maar daalna chahta hai, tu to mulk mein zaalim wa sarkash hona hee chahta hai aur tera ye iraada hee nahi ke milaap karne waalo mein se ho
